overview:
As Founder and Chief Executive Officer of FameCast, Kent brings more than 25 years of experience as a veteran entrepreneur within the internet and digital media arena.

Prior to founding FameCast, Kent served in founding and value creating CXO capacities with NetSpeed (Acquired by Cisco), NetPliance (IPO), TippingPoint (Acquired by 3Com) and Digital LifeStyles Group.

Kent currently serves as a Director for Innovo Group (INNO), a NASDAQ traded fashion denim company. He has been recognized as an Ernst & Young Entrepreneur of the Year finalist and has been the guest on CNBC Squawk Box, CNN Financial News, Fox News with Neil Cavuto and Silicon Spin.

Kent holds a Bachelor’s degree in Business from Oklahoma State University and a MBA from Southern Methodist University.
